name: jss
description: A simple and lightweight framework that allows you to style your DOM elements using JavaScript with a CSS-like syntax.

scriptDescriptions.jss: Default command, runs both JS and CSS
scriptDescriptions.jss:tree: This command will only run the parsed tree generator
scriptDescriptions.jss:js: Depend on javaScript only to style the DOM
scriptDescriptions.jss:css: Ignore javaScript and depend on CSS only to style the DOM
scriptDescriptions.jss:debug: Runs both JS and CSS and scans the project and generates the parsed tree, optimal for debugging and development
scriptDescriptions.jss:scan: Scans the project for any errors or warnings in the JSS file

author: Otman Kharbouch
